name: The Midnight Janitor Tales
description:
THE MIDNIGHT JANITOR TALES

Based on the 'Creepy Public Toilet Woman' creepypasta, an interactive fiction game in the style of retro horror games.

You play as Christopher the janitor and try to end your night shift while you avoid the entities that may end your life So get ready to step into the world of chaos and riddles. Each decision you make matters. The game has multiple endings based on the player's decision.

CONTROLS

Use <^> (Arrow Keys) to navigate and interact.

Made with Bitsy 3D by aloelazoe

Follow CULT BALM

Poster Artwork by Ankhesenamun (Sheena Ankshie)

Audio Production by LAX HEAD
